General.Rule: Respect all members of the community. Treat others with kindness and consideration.
Do not engage in any form of harassment, discrimination, or hate speech.
Keep discussions relevant to the channels they are in. Use appropriate channels for topics.
Do not share illegal or pirated content.
Do not distribute community resources without proper authorization.
Follow Discord's Terms of Service and Community Guidelines at all times.

VoiceChat.Rule: Use push-to-talk if your microphone picks up background noise.
Do not excessively disrupt voice channels. Let others have their conversations.
Do not play loud or disruptive music without the consent of everyone in the voice channel.
Do not use voice changers or soundboards in a way that disrupts conversation.

TextChat.Rule: Do not spam text channels. Avoid excessive use of emojis, caps lock, or repeated messages.
Refrain from discussing sensitive or NSFW topics in public text channels. Use appropriate channels for such discussions.
Do not share personal information or sensitive data in text channels.
Be mindful of spoilers. Use spoiler tags when discussing plot details or endings of recently released content.
Do not engage in heated arguments or flame wars. Respect differing opinions and handle disagreements maturely.
